remarks: Hilbert vector space associative law for subtraction.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Oct-1999.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hvass.1 $e |- A e. ~H $.
hvass.2 $e |- B e. ~H $.
hvass.3 $e |- C e. ~H $.
hvsubassi $p |- ( ( A -h B ) -h C ) = ( A -h ( B +h C ) ) $.
